name: Mahjong Adventure
description:
Mahjong Journey - Adventure Puzzle is a free mahjong game based on a classic Chinese game.(also known as Shanghai Mahjong, Taipei Mahjong, Kyodai, Mahjong Trails, or Shanghai mahjongg)

HOW TO PLAY:
Match pairs of identical tiles to remove them from the board until it's entirely cleared or until you find all special tiles. You can only match tiles which are free on at least one side.

FEATURES:
Many different skins to choose
Catchy music
Powerful boosters
Amazing rewards after each level
Special types of tiles to discover

- Pairs of Locked and Unlocking tiles - match scissors to free trapped tiles
- Reversed tiles - these flip around when selected

Great fit for players who love games like brain puzzles, crossword, chess, majong, word search, solitaire, match-3 and other smart games and puzzle brain games. Develop your mind and patience and strategy skills.
